pullRequest.title: Rosetta Individual Postgres User
pullRequest.bodyText:
Changes

Add a new postgres user, responsible only for Rosetta.
Modification of the initialization script
Configuration of all-in-one Dockerfile build process
Configuration of docker-compose build process

Merge pull request #162 from LimeChain/rosetta-pguser-addition

Rosetta pguser addition

nodes.bodyText: Would prefer this file at its original location. I'm guessing it was moved so you don't mount the other sql scripts into the docker volume. See my other comment.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,39 @@
+-- Change the values below if you are not installing via Docker

nodes.bodyText:
Should just be able to mount a single file:
- ./hedera-mirror-importer/src/main/resources/db/scripts/init.sql:/docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/init.sql

Or if that doesn't work the long syntax might.
What's the purpose of creating the mirror_node user idempotently if you're not going to also create the grpc and rosetta users the same way?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,39 @@
+-- Change the values below if you are not installing via Docker
+
+\set db_name 'mirror_node'
+\set db_user 'mirror_node'
+\set db_password 'mirror_node_pass'
+\set db_owner 'mirror_node'
+\set grpc_user 'mirror_grpc'
+\set grpc_password 'mirror_grpc_pass'
+\set rosetta_user 'mirror_rosetta'
+\set rosetta_password 'mirror_rosetta_pass'
+
+select 'create database mirror_node'
+where not exists (select from pg_database where datname = :'db_name')\gexec
+
+do $$
+begin
+  create user mirror_node with login createrole password 'mirror_node_pass';
+  exception when duplicate_object then
+  raise notice 'not creating user mirror_node -- it already exists';
+end
+$$;
+
+create user :grpc_user with login password :'grpc_password';

nodes.bodyText: This needs to use the rosetta_user and rosetta_password variables
This needs to use the grpc_user and grpc_password variables
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -6,17 +6,46 @@
 \set db_owner 'mirror_node'
 \set grpc_user 'mirror_grpc'
 \set grpc_password 'mirror_grpc_pass'
+\set rosetta_user 'mirror_rosetta'
+\set rosetta_password 'mirror_rosetta_pass'
+
+do $$
+begin
+  create user mirror_node with createrole password 'mirror_node_pass';
+  exception when duplicate_object then
+  raise notice 'not creating user mirror_node -- it already exists';
+end
+$$;
+
+select 'create database mirror_node'
+where not exists (select from pg_database where datname = :'db_name')\gexec
+
+do $$
+begin
+  create user mirror_grpc with login password 'mirror_grpc_pass';
